name: @log4brains/web
description: Log4brains web UI to edit and publish your Architecture Decision Records (ADR)
author: Thomas Vaillant <vaillant.thomas+gh@gmail.com>

scripts.dev: cross-env LOG4BRAINS_CWD=../.. LOG4BRAINS_DEV=1 ESM_DISABLE_CACHE=true node -r esm -r ts-node/register ./src/bin/main.ts
scripts.build: tsc --noEmit false && copyfiles next.config.js dist && copyfiles -u 1 src/bin/log4brains dist
